Sentencas: The coupling system proposed here is composed of a reforming solid oxide fuel cell (RSOFC) and a thermophotovoltaic cell (TPVC), where the synthesis gases (CH4 and CO) replacing H-2 is used as fuel.
Titulo: An efficient coupling system using a thermophotovoltaic cell to harvest the waste heat from a reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The performance characteristics of the coupling system and RSOFC are evaluated and compared.
Titulo: An efficient coupling system using a thermophotovoltaic cell to harvest the waste heat from a reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The optimal regions of the coupling system are determined and the parametric selection criteria are provided.
Titulo: An efficient coupling system using a thermophotovoltaic cell to harvest the waste heat from a reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The maximum power output densities of the R-SOFC-TPVC and SOFC-TPVC systems operated at 973-1273 K are calculated and compared with those of other SOFC-based coupling systems.
Titulo: An efficient coupling system using a thermophotovoltaic cell to harvest the waste heat from a reforming solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It is found that the SOFC-TPVC or R-SOFC-TPVC system has some obvious advantages.
Titulo: An efficient coupling system using a thermophotovoltaic cell to harvest the waste heat from a reforming solid oxide fuel cell
An efficient coupling system using a thermophotovoltaic cell to harvest the waste heat from a reforming solid oxide fuel cell
An efficient coupling system using a thermophotovoltaic cell to harvest the waste heat from a reforming solid oxide fuel cell
An efficient coupling system using a thermophotovoltaic cell to harvest the waste heat from a reforming solid oxide fuel cell
